hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash export APP_VERSION=`cat ${WORKSPACE}/application.properties | awk -F"=" '/app.version/ {print $2}'` sed -e "s|$APP_VERSION|4.1.0_${BUILD_NUMBER}|" -i '' ${WORKSPACE}/application.properties echo "Replacing app.version in application.properties from $APP_VERSION to 4.1.0_${BUILD_NUMBER}"
#!/bin/bash -x echo "Setting scala home to scala 2.11.2" cd /opt/tools rm scala ln -s scala-2.11.2 scala

#!/bin/bash export VERSION="4.1.0_${BUILD_NUMBER}" export Component="int-test-support"; echo "Component - $Component" export DB_Rebuild="Yes"; echo "DB_Rebuild - $DB_Rebuild" export Version=${VERSION}; echo "Version - $Version" export Clear_Logs="Yes"; echo "Clear_Logs - $Clear_Logs" export DeployTarg="devint"; echo "DeployTarg - $DeployTarg" export DeployUser="Jenkins"; echo "DeployUser = $DeployUser" export BUILD_TAG echo "--- Deployment ID: ${BUILD_TAG} - ${BUILD_ID}
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "Deployment to $DeployTarg by $DeployUser
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "Component: $Component
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log cd /opt/build/scripts ./Single_Component_Deploy.sh $Component $DB_Rebuild $Version $Clear_Logs $DeployTarg $BUILD_TAG $DeployUser echo "DB Rebuild: yes
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "URL For Deploy output: console
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "

" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log mv /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.html /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.tmp cat /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.tmp > /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.html rm /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.tmp rm /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log
